type.description: Property. NGSI Entity identifier. It has to be UAV-UTM-Flight-Message

createdAt.description: Property. Indicates the date/ time that the instance of the entity was created in ISO 8601 format. The value of this will be set by the server when the entity was created.

modifiedAt.description: Property. Indicates the date/ time when the entity was last modified in ISO 8601 format. The value of this will be set by the server when the entity was modified, if the entity has not been modified it may have a null value.

entityVersion.description: Property. The entity specification version as a number. A version number of 2.0 or later denotes the entity is represented using NGSI-LD

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

uav.description: Relationship. Reference to the UAV entity to which this UAVFlightMessage relates.

observedAt.description: Property. Indicates the date/time of the UAVFlightMessage record.

originatedByUAV.description: Property. A logical indicator of source of the message. True indicates it is the UAV itself, false indicates that it is a different source, a listening station software application or a different UAV.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

originator.description: Relationship. Refers to a third party UAV instance or other entity (e.g. listening station) that reported the information in the case the message was not directly originated by the UAV.

flightMessage.description: Property. A flight message describing the current flight status encoded as a Global UTM Message encoded as a JSON object. https://bitbucket.org/global_utm/flight-declaration-protocol

dateObserved.description: Property. Indicates the date/time the observation was recorded.Note this field was defined for use with NGSIv2 and is now deprecated. For new entities and applications replace with **observedAt**
